description: Create and manage form types in Amazon Datazone

Model.description: Indicates the smithy model of the API.

Smithy.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 100000  
Update requires: No interruption

Model.markdownDescription:

Update requires: No interruption

DomainIdentifier.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain in which this metadata form type is created.
DomainIdentifier.markdownDescription:
The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain in which this metadata form type is created.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^dzd[-_][a-zA-Z0-9_-]{1,36}$  
Update requires: Replacement

Maximum Length: 128
